FuncDef: The reset ip userlog statistics command clears statistics about user login and logout logs.
CLIs: reset ip userlog statistics [ access | call-status ]

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about user login and logout logs.
-

Clears statistics about user online result logs.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the device is enabled to generate user login, logout, and online result logs and send the logs to a log server, you can run the display ip userlog access statistic command to query statistics about the logs. To re-collect statistics about user login, logout, and online result logs, run the reset ip userlog statistics access command to clear existing statistics.
Statistics about user login, logout, and online result logs cannot be restored after they are cleared. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display ip userlog access statistic command to check whether statistics about user login, logout, and online result logs are cleared.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
